verses.plain: O give thanks unto the LORD; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.

tokens.t: O give thanks unto the
; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.

verses.plain: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.

tokens.t: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.

verses.plain: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.

tokens.t: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the

verses.plain: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.

tokens.t: Seek the
, and his strength: seek his face evermore.

verses.plain: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;

tokens.t: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;

verses.plain: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.

tokens.t: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.

verses.plain: He is the LORD our God: his judgments are in all the earth.

tokens.t: He
the
our God: his judgments
in all the earth.

verses.plain: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations.

tokens.t: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word
he commanded to a thousand generations.

verses.plain: Which covenant he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;

tokens.t: Which
he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;

verses.plain: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant:

tokens.t: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law,
to Israel
an everlasting covenant:

verses.plain: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:

tokens.t: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:

verses.plain: When they were but a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.

tokens.t: When they were
a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.

verses.plain: When they went from one nation to another, from one kingdom to another people;

tokens.t: When they went from one nation to another, from
kingdom to another people;

verses.plain: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;

tokens.t: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;

verses.plain: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

tokens.t: , Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

verses.plain: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.

tokens.t: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.

verses.plain: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:

tokens.t: He sent a man before them,
Joseph,
was sold for a servant:

verses.plain: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:

tokens.t: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:

verses.plain: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.

tokens.t: Until the time that his word came: the word of the
tried him.

verses.plain: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.

tokens.t: The king sent and loosed him;
the ruler of the people, and let him go free.

verses.plain: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:

tokens.t: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:

verses.plain: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.

tokens.t: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.

verses.plain: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.

tokens.t: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.

verses.plain: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.

tokens.t: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.

verses.plain: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.

tokens.t: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.

verses.plain: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.

tokens.t: He sent Moses his servant;
Aaron whom he had chosen.

verses.plain: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.

tokens.t: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.

verses.plain: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.

tokens.t: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.

verses.plain: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.

tokens.t: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.

verses.plain: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.

tokens.t: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.

verses.plain: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.

tokens.t: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies,
lice in all their coasts.

verses.plain: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.

tokens.t: He gave them hail for rain,
flaming fire in their land.

verses.plain: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.

tokens.t: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.

verses.plain: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,

tokens.t: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,

verses.plain: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.

tokens.t: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.

verses.plain: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.

tokens.t: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.

verses.plain: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.

tokens.t: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and
not one feeble
among their tribes.

verses.plain: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.

tokens.t: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.

verses.plain: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.

tokens.t: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.

verses.plain: The people asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.

tokens.t: asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.

verses.plain: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places like a river.

tokens.t: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places
a river.

verses.plain: For he remembered his holy promise, and Abraham his servant.

tokens.t: For he remembered his holy promise,
Abraham his servant.

verses.plain: And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness:

tokens.t: And he brought forth his people with joy,
his chosen with gladness:

verses.plain: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;

tokens.t: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;

verses.plain: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the LORD.

tokens.t: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the

footnotes.text: he…: Heb. his soul came into iron
his…: Heb. words of his signs
